posts.message:
Hey Guys , I have some confusion about using the injection dependency at android like dagger and butter knife with architecture patterns , Does it consuming alot of processing time to arrange all these classes .. when I read codes about this I saw more lines of code but do very simple function .. so the paradox is why use this if it can be done with little code ?.
thnx

If you've ever tried Angular2 you will see the enormous size of minified Javascript just to reproduce the Hello World. I've received an answer from the Angular2 team that they are trying to minimize the Hello World to < 10KB. 

This is the Tweet: https://twitter.com/mhevery/status/702880006934892544
And this is the Proposal: https://docs.google.com/document/d/14_PBtkOL0vyyRFmXxkRnz6GFWXjYisxZohDxdl1jV4c/edit#heading=h.5yvt35ou3s01
posts.caption: twitter.com

posts.message:
In response to some news about not being able to use local payment cards to pay for some services in USD, I suggest trying to use PayPal.

PayPal provides a service in which you can choose either to pay in the transaction's currency (e.g. USD) or in your card's currency (i.e. EGP). In the latter case, PayPal does the conversion for a fee of about 3.66%. That's almost the same as what the Egyptian banks charge now after the latest changes (3.5%, previously was 2.5%).

There are two good things about doing this:
1) You pay in EGP, so you're not subject to any limitations by the CBE on foreign currency payments.
2) PayPal does the conversion, relieving the Egyptian economy from availing the foreign currency.

Disclaimer: I'm not affiliated with PayPal and I'm not trying to promote their service, but rather trying to help solve our problem.

some of my latest open-source projects that have been created "just for fun"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[*] Axync: an asynchrounous php7 kernel based on generators .
> https://github.com/alash3al/axync
> language: PHP "7.0"
--
[*] Xerver: a tiny standalone static & reverse fastcgi proxy with no configs

> language: Go
> binaries are available "cross-platform" .
--
[*] Googly: search google from the terminal
> https://github.com/alash3al/googly
> language: Go 
> binaries are available "cross-platform" .

لو فاكر ان google drive او box او حتي mega.nz صاحبه ال50 giga مساحتهم حلوه 

في Tencent Weiyun بيديك مساحه توصل ل 2Terabyte سجلت فيه عيبه ان اي ملف اكتر من 1 giga بيبقا ليه مده سماح اسبوع بعد كدا بيتمسح اي حاجه اقل من كدا مفيش مشاكل

في 360 qihoo بيديك مساحه تصل ل 36 terabyte عن طريق تحميل الapps بتاعتهم و اتمام بروفايلك معرفتش اسجل فيه عشان محتاج خط صيني

في yun.baidu بيديك مساحه لحد 2 Tera بس محتاج تنزل الابليكيشن بتاعهم عشان يديهالك 
الشركات كلها صيني فاستخدم google translate 
ملحوظه ممكن تسجل علي tencent weiyun و عن طريق حسابك تدخل بيه yun.baidu الخدمات كلها مجانا و مفبش كم الاعلانات الرهيب الي بيبقا في اي اغلب مواقع الرفع زي mediafire
شرح طرق التسجيل ف اللينك ده http://www.1mtb.com/how-to-get-50-tb-free-cloud-storage-get-huge-gbs-of-free-cloud-storage/

posts.description:
ورجعنا :D بكنز و عالم ال Computer Science 
في ال Post دا مجمعين أفضل المصادر و الكورسات المقدمة من أقوي الجامعات في العالم و المتوفرة مجانا علي الانترنت للدخول و البداية في تعلم علوم الحاسوب و العديد من هذه الكورسات هي Intro to Computer Science و لو أنت مستعد أن شاء الله تدخل كلية  حاسيات ومعلومات فلازم تأخد كورس ال Intro to Computer Science المقدم من العديد من الجامعات المعتمدة عالمية والمتوفرة علي الانترنت :-

ونبدأ بالكورسات والمصادر :- 
1-Introduction to Computer Science From Harvard University
https://www.edx.org/course/introduction-computer-science-harvardx-cs50x
bit.ly/21GdraA

2-Intro to Computer Science From Udacity 
bit.ly/1OTk9O0

3-Computer Science 101 Stanford University
https://www.coursera.org/course/cs101

4-Introduction to Computer Science and Programming MIT 
bit.ly/1p1l8Hl

5-Introduction to Computer Science From Alison
https://alison.com/courses/Introduction-to-Computer-Science

6-All Computer Science Resourses From Khan Academy
https://www.khanacademy.org/computing/computer-science

7-موقع فيه 140 كورس كامل لكل مجالات الــــ Computer Science
http://learnerstv.com/Free-Computer-Science-video-lecture-courses.htm

-5 كتب يجب علي كل مبرمج قراءتها
http://bit.ly/1PnyjZc

-10 خطوات لبرمجة تطبيق ناجح و تسويقه جيدا
http://www.hafedktech.com/2015/10/10-ways-to-make-great-app.html

10-Design and Analysis of Algorithms From MIT
bit.ly/1L6tjf7

11-البوست العالمي للمبرمج 
http://on.fb.me/1LWKMBw

وبقية المصادر قادمة :) تابعونا 
برعاية المجتمع التقني هفيدك تك © http://www.hafedktech.com
